DOC.brief_title: Randomized Crossover Trial Assess Tolerability Gonadotropin Releasing Hormone ( GnRH ) Analogue Administration
DOC.detailed_description: GnRH give injection . Injections GnRH uncomfortable , cause feel burn stinging . The uncomfortable feeling may cause difference type GnRH site injection ( skin abdomen , muscle buttock thigh ) .
DOC.criteria: Male patient diagnosis advanced prostate cancer treatment triptorelin pamoate leuprolide acetate indicate ; At least 18 year age ; Life expectancy least 1 year ; Capable complete study questionnaire without assistance . Patients treatment triptorelin pamoate leuprolide acetate contraindicate ; Known hypersensitivity triptorelin , leuprolide GnRH luteinizing hormone release hormone ( LHRH ) agonists , GnRH LHRH ; Clinically significant systemic disease condition would , investigator 's opinion , lead undue risk follow administration either triptorelin leuprolide ; History alcohol/drug abuse within past year ; History significant medical problem may confound outcome study ; Requires concomitant medication may affect study assessment ( e.g. , topical medication use pretreatment injection site pain ) ; Participated another investigational drug study within 30 day Judged investigator unsuitable enrollment study reason
